review.title: “Dynamic, aspiring home-grown enterprise on the path to grow international.”
review.pros: Pros – (1) Never fails to challenge and excite(2) Plenty of opportunities to learn about diverse business functions ranging from finance, sales, marketing and HR, etc. Also a good place to gain hands-on experience in doing international business(3) Good performance does not go unrecognized
review.cons: Cons – (1) Not for someone who is reluctant to get his/her hands dirty(2) Expected to stretch beyond one's scope of work(3) Compensation and benefits not as attractive as its counterparts
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – (1) Pay more attention to employee development and talent retention(2) Try not to over-stretch employees too often(3) Ensuring competitiveness of compensation and benefits
